description: ATS: Add Then Sort (i.e. double previous term and then sort digits).
comments: Starting from a(1)=1 sequence cycles starting from a(25)=48889, 77789, 155578, 111356, 122227, 244445, 48889, ... etc.
example: a(8)=29 since a(7)=46, 46+46=92 and 92 sorted is 29
crossrefs: Cf. A033861 for STA, A004000 for RATS.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Oct 09 2000
